data.text:
@buperac Just promise that you will keep your mask up over your nose!

I too am a prisoner in my own country. In B.C. 90% of the population VOTED to make me a 2nd class citizen by downloading their Nazi Papers. EVERY DAY they continue to keep that shit on their phone they keep voting. https://t.co/MqcsD4yqOA
@buperac Safest not to get on one anyway 💉

@buperac "...48 people are dying with a positive Covid test..."

I dispute even those numbers, especially in light of the Covid test having been proven useless for the purpose of diagnosing a virus infection. I bet people are dying 'with Covid' and not 'of Covid'. Age & co-morbidities?

@buperac Hanging onto the threads of this DEAD narrative but wont last long and even the sheep have limits and when they turn- it will be cataclysmic - but until then its brainless decisions made by brainless leaders in our case following the Klaus Schwab hand-book of poop..
